title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 203.15 - Exemptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 203.15 - Exemptions

State Regulations

Any grower whose aggregate number of planted acres of
onions in production in any marketing season is less than five shall be exempt
for that marketing season. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
203.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
